title: Could Blood Moon Diana have a take off/put on mask toggle?
body:
Something like the Night Hunter Rengar skin where he has his hood toggle when he taunts or Heimerdinger's 'derpy' walk/regular walk toggle whenever you use an emote as him?

Would something like that be possible or is that asking for too much?

I'm asking this because when I saw the splash art for this skin on surrender 20, that sort of idea just screams out begging to be done with this skin and not just left to her backing animation.

As of right now, I think the only way to save face for Diana is if she's "Half Demon" or demon possessed.

As in, the reason she can take off that mask is because she assumed and donned the power of the mask and the blood moon instead of being born or manifested in it.  At the very least, that would explain why the mask can be removed despite the BM symbol burning bright on her forehead.

At this point, I think the breadth of the BM universe has grown to where Akali may be the only human (non-demon) but everyone else is under the spell or born as such.  Because, as of right now, there's no other proper explanation if her removing the mask is an important AU lore element.

That would be cool tho, if it was like, the mask turned her into a demon? Like rather than the moon straight up giving her power, the blood moon offered her the mask, giving her power in exchange for her humanity. Then the splash could be her last moments as a human before she gave that up to be a powerful blood moon demon. If that were the story, I honestly wouldn't mind.
